snippet.title: ShapeHero Factory | New Official Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
DEMO available on Steam starting May 30st, 2024!
"Factory x Roguelite x Tower Defense" gives birth to a new sensation of factory game! Combine the shapes of ◯, △, and ▢ in the factory to mass-produce various heroes, and fight your way through a wave-based tower defense!
Enjoy the dilemma of selecting the most pertinent equipment and finding a path to create the most efficient production line over and over... all to bring your very own factory to perfection!
Full version coming in 2024!

Play Now:https://store.steampowered.com/app/2389040/ShapeHero_Factory?utm_source=off&utm_campaign=en&utm_medium=yt&utm_content=trailer

Discord:https://discord.gg/csDtSpH7BA
Official X:https://x.com/ShapeHero_GLB

#shapehero #indie #trailer
